# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to meet high standards and provide exceptional value. Given its quality and the effort put into its creation, I believe it's worth more than just a hundred dollars. However, to make this opportunity accessible, I am offering it to you at an introductory price of $120. This is a limited-time offer, so I hope you'll consider taking advantage of it. If you have any questions or need more information about the product, feel free to ask. Looking forward to your response! 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $120. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $120
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $150
